item.title: WP Matador recovery
item.description: Deck ovens for baking bread manufactured by WP Matador. Year of release 1995. A complete overhaul was carried out with the replacement of all executive units, including complete disassembly, replacement-welding of metal, cleaning, primer-painting, assembly, insulation with mineral wool, installation of cladding. Burners - gas, new Giersch RG20. The control panels are made from scratch according to our own design. Light - 4 incandescent lamps 50W, soft start, timer shutdown.
